preparation.raw_text:
1. In a clean and dry glass container, measure 56.00 g of Nickel(II) oxide and 43.00 g of Selenium dioxide.  
 2. Add 5.00 g of Sodium carbonate to the mixture.  
 3. Stir the mixture thoroughly using a dry stirrer until a uniform powder is obtained.
